name: Jet Racing Extreme (Early Access)
description:
Get behind the wheel of a very powerful jet-powered vehicle and blast off!
Crazy driving will result in incredible collisions and wreckage!

What is included:

  • Certified pilot (unlimited multiplayer);
  • Uber afterburner (+80% thrust);
  • 10 000 barrels for upgrades;
  • Updates and all new stuff for free.

---------------------------------------------------------------

http://srj-studio.itch.io/jet-racing-extreme-web

http://srj-studio.itch.io/jet-racing-extreme
